class.name: Occluder
class.brief_description: Allows [OccluderShape]s to be used for occlusion culling within the portal system.
class.description: As well as occlusion culling using portals, the portal system allows simple geometric primitives to be used as occluders. These are attached to the node as [OccluderShape] resources. Multiple primitives can be used within a single shape, this allows a large number of occluders to be placed efficiently.
